item.description:
Thursday, March 14 at 7pm
Kevin Cullen & Shelley Murphy
Whitey Bulger:
America’s Most Wanted Gangster & the Manhunt That Brought Him to Justice

AT BROOKLINE PUBLIC LIBRARY
361 Washington St., Brookline

In this new, unflinching account of Whitey Bulger, Boston Globe reporters Kevin Cullen and Shelley Murphy delve deeper into the world he created. Is he a social bandit or criminal mastermind? Followers of the case will devour this book. This event will be held at Hunneman Hall at the main branch of the Public Library of Brookline.
item.how_to_find_us: Find Kathy at 6:45PM inside the BROOKLINE PUBLIC LIBRARY ask for the Whitey Bulger book talk is at!
item.name: Whitey Bulger event at Brookline Public Library with Kathy
